name: @hubspot/cli-lib
description: Library for creating scripts for working with HubSpot

scripts.check-main: branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && [ $branch = prep-for-release ] || (echo 'Error: New release can only be published on master branch' && exit 1)
scripts.release:major: npm run check-main && npm version major && npm publish --tag latest && npm run push
scripts.release:minor: npm run check-main && npm version minor && npm publish --tag latest && npm run push
scripts.release:patch: npm run check-main && npm version patch && npm publish --dry-run --tag latest && npm run push
